name: Blade of Sky: Battle of the Pacific Islands HD
name_original: Blade of Sky: Battle of the Pacific Islands HD
description:
Play 3D war game Blade of Sky: Battle of the Pacific Islands HD as a pilot of an American aircraft in the WW2 in the Pacific.

>>>Missions
The campaign contains missions from the easiest to the most difficult ones.
There's also a battle where you try to achieve the highest score by downing enemies.

>>>Easy Control
The aircraft is easy to control to everyone by tilting your device and it is prevented to turn the aircraft upside down. There are buttons for shooting and dropping bombs in the lower right corner. The pointer of speed is in the lower left corner. You can speed up or slow down by pressing the arrow keys.

>>>Compatibility
The game perfectly works on the iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPod Touch 5rd generation, iPad2, iPad3, iPad4 and newer.
The game is compatible with iPod Touch 4rd generation and iPhone 4 since version 1.1.1.

>>>We need you
Please leave a comment with your impressions or suggestions for future updates, thank you.

GOOD LUCK!
